context_of_use: This use case allows admins to create and update products, including pricing and product details within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control product availability and pricing
description: This use case enables admins to create new products and update existing product prices to ensure accurate product information.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and authorized to manage products.
postconditions: New products are created and existing product prices are updated in the system.
assumptions: The admin has the necessary permissions to create and update products.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to create new products.
The system shall allow admins to update product prices.
outstanding_issues: Need to define the validation rules for product creation and updates.
main_flow: 1. Admin creates a new product → System saves the new product details.
2. Admin updates an existing product price → System updates the product price.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the product creation fails due to validation errors, the system displays an error message and prompts the admin to correct the input.
